sentences.en: "He seems to be all right now," reported a relieved Taylor.
sentences.cn: “他现在看上去没事了，”泰勒放心地报告。

sentences.en: A relieved smile spread over his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上绽开了宽慰的笑容。

sentences.en: He was relieved at the result.
sentences.cn: 对这个结果他感到宽慰。

sentences.en: He was relieved of his duties as presidential adviser.
sentences.cn: 他被撤销了总统顾问一职。

sentences.en: I am relieved to hear that this isn't true.
sentences.cn: 听到这不是真的,我感到宽心了.

sentences.en: I am very relieved that it is over.
sentences.cn: 这件事结束之后我感到轻松极了。

sentences.en: I was relieved to see that he seemed almost himself again.
sentences.cn: 看到他又恢复理智,我总算放心了.

sentences.en: I'm relieved to learn that you have recovered from your illness.
She was glad to be relieved of this burden.
sentences.cn: 她很高兴卸掉了这个包袱.

sentences.en: Sore throats may be relieved by cold compresses.
sentences.cn: 喉咙痛用冷敷布敷一下可能会好一些。

sentences.en: The economic gloom of the early 1980s was relieved by fanciful architecture.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代初期的经济萧条气氛因各种奇异古怪建筑的出现而有所缓解。

sentences.en: We are all relieved to be back home.
sentences.cn: 回到家我们都松了一口气。

sentences.en: We were greatly relieved to learn that his condition was not serious.
sentences.cn: 听说他的病情并不严重,我们的心就宽多了.

sentences.en: We were relieved to hear that she was out of danger.
sentences.cn: 听说她脱险了,我们的心才放下来.

sentences.en: With the capture of the escaped tiger, everyone felt relieved.
sentences.cn: 逃出来的老虎被捕获后, 大家都松了一口气.

sentences.en: You'll be relieved to know your jobs are safe.
sentences.cn: 现在知道你们的工作保住了，可以放心了。

sentences.en: Your coming relieved me of the bother of writing a long letter.
sentences.cn: 你来了,省去我写长信的麻烦了.

words.tran_cn: 解除，减轻；使不单调乏味；换…的班；解围；使放心

trans.tran_en: If you are relieved, you feel happy because something unpleasant has not happened or is no longer happening

trans.tran_cn: 解除(relieve的过去分词)，减轻，使得到解脱，使宽慰
